posts.post_content:
Have more dupes to get rid of, prices are negotiable. Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

Buyer pays $2 shipping for 1 or 2 cards. 3 or more and shipping is free. Payment by paypal F&F is preferred.

Also, if you have anything for trade, I'll listen.  There are definitely some upgrades I'm needing and always could use an EPDG if you have any.

PM sent on Cicotte.

another PM.
